channel.title: [PI] make 10 only makes 5
channel.description:
So I cant figure this out. When smithing weapons and armour in my server, the "make 10" option only makes 5. I don't know the action button ID either. Here's a picture for clarification I guess. Help?
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/25u0h.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] make 10 only makes 5
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“mc wobbla, post:1, topic:466703”]So I cant figure this out. When smithing weapons and armour in my server, the “make 10” option only makes 5. I don’t know the action button ID either. Here’s a picture for clarification I guess. Help?

[/quote]

You need to find where it makes the items, it shouldn’t be too difficult to find considering it’s only smithing related. There should be two blocks of code that are near enough the same for ‘Make 5’. You should know what to do from there.

Read full topic
